thread.section_title: Italki 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Italki 的点评意见 | www.italki.com
thread.title: Jose Flores
thread.title_full: Italki 的点评人 Jose Flores

author: Jose Flores
title: Jose Flores
text: Italki is an interface platform between languages teachers and students that makes easy to learn providing you with all the structure needed; from selecting the teacher according with your needs through the organization of your lessons schedule and follow up, and as well supportive materials to speed up the learning process. They provide great service in real time giving you the total control of your time, learning pace and budget !
